Text.Page:
Have you heard about the traitor, Kagaron? He sold us out to Atel Akaad!

But he didn't seem too happy when the vampirs dragged him into Sinestral Manor. I guess treason doesn't pay, eh ?

We should make sure that the federation delivers final judgment on him, not the vampirs. Poetic justice, you might say.

Kagaron got what he deserved. Well, he deserved worse, I suppose.

he didn't get away with it...er...

Not for long, anyway!
